Learn More: NSF-Certified LED High Bay Lights

NSF-certified LED high bays, also known as washdown high bays, are lighting fixtures specifically designed for use in environments where cleanliness and sanitation are paramount.

Features of NSF-Certified LED High Bays/Washdown High Bays:

  • Cleanability: NSF-certified high bay lights have housings designed to be easily cleaned and are resistant to water, helping to maintain hygiene standards.
  • Durability: The fixtures are generally made of materials that can withstand frequent high-pressure washdowns, corrosive agents, and extreme temperature fluctuations.
  • Efficiency: Like all LED fixtures, LED washdown high bays offer significant energy savings compared to traditional lighting technologies.
  • Long Lifespan: LED lights typically have long lifespans, reducing the frequency and cost of replacement. This is true for NSF-certified LED high bays as well.

Applications:

NSF-certified LED high bays are often used in:

  • Food processing facilities
  • Commercial kitchens
  • Pharmaceutical plants
  • Medical facilities
  • Any areas where strict hygiene and cleanliness are required

Choosing a Model:

When choosing LED washdown light, keep the following considerations in mind:

  1. NSF Certification: Confirm that the light has been certified by NSF International, a trusted independent product testing organization.
  2. Brightness and Efficiency: Ensure the light provides adequate illumination for your space and is energy-efficient.
  3. Durability: Look for lights with robust construction that can withstand harsh cleaning chemicals and processes.
  4. Temperature Rating: Some environments may require lights that can operate in extreme temperatures. If this is the case, look for fixtures rated for those conditions.
  5. Light Color and Quality: Depending on the work being done in your space, you might need high color accuracy or a specific color temperature.
  6. Warranty: Check the warranty to understand what is covered and for how long. Also consider how reachable and responsive the supplier is, should you need support.
  7. Ease of Installation: Look for NSF LED high bays lights that are easy to install, preferably by a single person, which can reduce installation costs.

Always ensure the lighting solution you choose is appropriate for the specific requirements of your space. If you need help determining how many fixtures or what wattage you need, or how the lights should be spaced, ELEDLights offers a free high bay lighting layout service that can answer all those questions. Just submit the short form & our lighting pros will take care of the calculations for you.
